Thailand's paroled former PM Thaksin meets prosecutor on royal insult caseThailand's newly paroled former Prime Minister Thaksin Shinawatra has met with a prosecutor over a royal insult complaint stemming from a 2015 interview, the attorney general's office said on Monday. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 03:05:12 GMT TJCW2BXDK5N3DEYZMN276A5HHY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/thailands-paroled-former-pm-thaksin-meets-prosecutor-royal-insult-case-2024-02-19/Reuters世界亚太地区
Japan hosts Ukraine reconstruction meeting, pledges new tax treatyJapan hosted Ukrainian Prime Minister Denys Shmyhal on Monday in Tokyo to discuss the reconstruction of Ukraine, pledging a new bilateral tax treaty and other support for Japanese businesses as the Ukraine war rages on. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 02:10:15 GMT Z32V2TUIYVK7XIJEQWZT6HFLU4 https://www.reuters.com/world/japan-hosts-ukraine-reconstruction-meeting-pledges-new-tax-treaty-2024-02-19/Sakura Murakami世界
Brazil retail billionaire Abilio Diniz dies at 87Brazilian billionaire Abilio Diniz, who built an empire in the supermarket retail sector, died on Sunday in Sao Paulo, according to his press office. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 01:11:51 GMT EMAOJRF73FKA7M7OFVJT27WSXA https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/brazil-retail-billionaire-abilio-diniz-dies-87-2024-02-19/Reuters世界美洲
World Court to hear arguments on Israeli occupation of Palestinian territoriesThe United Nations' top court on Monday opens a week of hearings on the legal consequences of Israel's occupation of Palestinian territories, with more than 50 states due to address the judges. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 00:02:30 GMT SI324B4EVFJEDBO5I6TD44KRDU https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/world-court-hear-arguments-israeli-occupation-palestinian-territories-2024-02-19/Reuters世界中东
Sydney school, supermarket tainted with asbestos as crisis widensSeven more public sites in Sydney, including a school, sports hub and supermarket, were exposed to asbestos, authorities said on Monday, as the contamination of the toxic material widened and officials rushed to remove it from public spaces. Sun, 18 Feb 2024 22:53:05 GMT 7M3R5L7QAJK5LAB2YXIW5BTB6Y https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/sydney-school-supermarket-tainted-with-asbestos-crisis-widens-2024-02-18/Reuters可持续发展气候与能源
At least 53 killed in tribal fighting in Papua New Guinea, ABC reportsAt least 53 people were killed in tribal fighting in the northern highlands of Papua New Guinea, Australian Broadcasting Corporation (ABC) said on Monday, citing local police. Sun, 18 Feb 2024 22:43:46 GMT N4X52WAUR5J5JKPOBRV3VYPB5A https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/least-53-killed-tribal-fighting-papua-new-guinea-abc-2024-02-18/Reuters世界非洲
Spanish conservatives retain majority in Galicia regional voteSpain's opposition conservative People's Party retained its absolute majority in its stronghold in the northwest region of Galicia on Sunday in a close-run regional election. Sun, 18 Feb 2024 22:39:30 GMT VWY6VPD5QFLCJC3FGAWKZYIBDA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/spanish-conservatives-retain-majority-galicia-regional-vote-2024-02-18/Reuters世界欧洲
UK-registered cargo ship reported under attack in Bab al-Mandab Strait, says AmbreyA UK-registered cargo ship reported being under attack in the Bab al-Mandab Strait off Yemen on Sunday, said British maritime security firm Ambrey, while UK Maritime Trade Operations agency reported crew abandoning a ship off Yemen after an explosion. Sun, 18 Feb 2024 21:35:28 GMT DSIFEDI2NVLP7JP4OBEABXBMOQ https://www.reuters.com/world/ambrey-uk-registered-cargo-ship-reported-under-attack-bab-al-mandab-strait-2024-02-18/Reuters世界
Norway to facilitate transfer of funds to Palestinian AuthorityNorway has agreed to help facilitate the transfer of frozen tax funds earmarked for the Palestinian Authority (PA) that were collected by Israel, the Norwegian government said on Sunday, providing vital funding to the Western-backed entity. Sun, 18 Feb 2024 21:01:07 GMT MGC7SJZWV5P35NNBOWZ32IGEMA https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/norway-facilitate-transfer-funds-palestinian-authority-2024-02-18/Gwladys Fouche世界中东
Mexicans turn out in droves to 'protect democracy' ahead of electionsHuge crowds filled Mexico City's main square on Sunday in support of the nation's electoral authority, accusing President Andres Manuel Lopez Obrador of trying to weaken the body ahead of a presidential election in June. Sun, 18 Feb 2024 20:31:27 GMT TW64AZEAPRLYZITBSMF6BHZHUA https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/mexicans-turn-out-droves-protect-democracy-ahead-elections-2024-02-18/Kylie Madry世界美洲
Ukraine accuses Russia of executing injured prisoners at Avdiivka, VeseleUkrainian authorities said on Sunday they had opened an investigation into alleged shootings by Russian forces of six unarmed Ukrainian soldiers in the city of Avdiivka, and two at a village in the same region, after Russia claimed full control of the city. Sun, 18 Feb 2024 19:52:10 GMT E43WJCTTV5N7FHH35GDEKHIJFY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine-accuses-Russia-executing-injured-prisoners-avdiivka-vesele-2024-02-18/Reuters世界欧洲
